title: Before I Knew It, The Woman Next Door Was Making My College Life A Lot More Fun - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Mature   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Anti-social Protagonist   Award-winning Work   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   College/University   Early Romance   Easy Going Life   Friendship   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Epanterias   エパンテリアス
description:
Winner of the 4th Kakuyom Web Novel Contest’s special award division in the romantic comedy category.

“This seat is empty, right? Can I sit here?”

Sasaki Kento, a third-year college student who is always studying alone, meets Ito Natsuki, a beautiful woman who appears in the seat next to him. — Then, with Natsuki’s presence, Kento’s life gradually begins to change colors. 

“Have you thought about indirect kissing?” “Give me your contact information.” “I’d like to stay over this time.” “I want to be friends with Kento…..”

Natsuki continues to approach Kento, who is awkward with women for some reason. Slowly but surely, the gap between them narrows—this is the story of a young boy who is clumsy and reluctant to show his kindness, and a beautiful woman who discovers his hidden kindness.>
